long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Image Viewer is an extension designed to provide users with quick and easy access to the file size of images on any webpage. It's a practical tool for web developers, graphic designers, and anyone interested in the technical aspects of online images. Just turn on the extension and hover over the image and you'll see.
